results.title: Three students
results.creator_credit: Brian Bergin, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Further Education”
One of a series of films which deal with the belief that our education should not stop with formal studies at school. This film is about three adults who have undertaken adult education courses.

results.title: Designing a curriculum
results.creator_credit: Brian Bergin, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Further Education”.
One of a series of films which deal with the idea that our education should not stop with the end of formal studies. Courses are designed to allow students to develop a balanced background in subject undertaken so that they can think creatively and flexibly about work.

results.creator_credit: Brian Bergin, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Further Education”.
One of a series of films which deal with the belief that our education should not stop with formal studies at school. Further education centres are located in major centres throughout South Australia. Shows some of the activities undertaken at Victor Harbour.

results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Further Education”.
One of a series of films which deal with the idea that our education should not stop with the end of formal studies. Explains how and why sources are allocated for adult education in South Australia.

results.title: Field events
results.creator_credit: Jan Ladlo and Associated Film Services
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Fundamentals of the Track and Field for Girls”.
This film designed as a teaching tool, emphasizes form and techniques. The field events such as long jump; standing broad jump; high jump; discus; shot put; and javelin are explained.

results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Fundamentals of the Track and Field for Girls”.
This film designed as a teaching tool, emphasizes form and technique. It covers track and field events in girls competition such as: sprints, middle-distance and distance running, hurdles and relays

results.title: Full of Life

results.title: Coping (Captioned)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Full of Life”.
This is part of series designed for use by upper secondary students and school leavers. The transition from being a student to a working young adult seeking independence can be fraught with unexpected responsibilities and financial problems. This program describes what to expect once you begin working, together with hints on basic survival techniques and personal budgeting.

results.title: Keep moving (Captioned)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Full of Life”.
Promotes the importance of regular exercise including the positive effects of physical exertion and eating the correct foods. Designed to trigger young people’s interest in wanting to include exercise as a regular part of a balanced lifestyle.
